A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Horrible and set in the wrong universe.  Star Wars universe had hyperspace not 'lightspeed'\,  the fat asian chick was annoying\, the purple haired menopausal \"admiral\" was vomit inducing\, and Leya's superman flight is best forgotten.  No wonder Luke turned into a grumpy old fart\, he had to share the galaxy with those twats.  Oh and whoever wrote the jokes is mentally stuck in the preschool's toilet.
